cluster_classes.class_description: Various types of stainless steels categorized by their metallurgical structures, including austenitic, ferritic, martensitic, and duplex.
cluster_classes.evidence_excerpt: Austenitic, ferritic, and martensitic stainless steels are specific families within stainless steels.

members.entity_description: 300 Series stainless steels including Types 304, 304L, 304H, 309, 310, 316, 316L, 316H, 321, 321H, 347, and 347H.
A family of stainless steels including Types 405, 409, 430, 442, and 446.
A type of stainless steel that includes Types 410, 410S, 416, 420, 440A, 440B, and 440C.

cluster_classes.class_description: Different metallurgical structures found in steels, including austenitic, ferritic, and martensitic, known for their corrosion resistance.
cluster_classes.evidence_excerpt: Austenitic, ferritic, and martensitic are metallurgical structures in steels.

cluster_classes.class_description: Metallurgical structure: austenite, found in 300 Series stainless steels and nickel base alloys.
cluster_classes.evidence_excerpt: Austenitic, ferritic, and martensitic are metallurgical structures in steels.

members.entity_description: A type of metallurgical structure (austenite) found in 300 Series stainless steels and nickel base alloys, known for its corrosion resistance.

cluster_classes.class_description: Metallurgical structure: ferrite, found in carbon and low alloy steels and many 400 series stainless steels.
cluster_classes.evidence_excerpt: Austenitic, ferritic, and martensitic are metallurgical structures in steels.

members.entity_description: A type of metallurgical structure (ferrite) found in carbon and low alloy steels and many 400 series stainless steels, known for its corrosion resistance.

cluster_classes.class_description: Metallurgical structure: martensite, found in some stainless steels.
cluster_classes.evidence_excerpt: Austenitic, ferritic, and martensitic are metallurgical structures in steels.

members.entity_description: A metallurgical structure (martensite) found in some stainless steels, known for its corrosion resistance.

splits.name: Austenitic Stainless Steels

splits.name: Ferritic Stainless Steels
splits.description: Stainless steels with ferritic structure, including 400 Series types.

splits.name: Martensitic Stainless Steels
splits.description: Stainless steels with martensitic structure, including Types 410, 420, 440, etc.

args.justification: ClsC_e02e2ae6 is overloaded, grouping distinct stainless steel types by metallurgical structure; splitting enables clearer mapping to structure-based classes.

args.new_description: Metallurgical structures found in steels, including austenitic, ferritic, and martensitic.
args.justification: Class label and group updated for clarity and to align with other structure-based classes.
